RED7

The card game

by Marta Adell

Player 1's turn

Select number of players:

Current player's hand

Rule

Color rules:

Red: Highest card
Orange: Cards of one number
Yellow: Cards of one color
Green: Even cards
Blue: Cards of all different colors
Indigo: Cards that form a run (I.E. 4 5 6)
Purple: Cards bellow 4

Player 1's palette

Player 2's palette

Player 3's palette

Player 4's palette

Action rules:

1: Choose a card from another player's Palette, and place it face down on top of the Draw Deck. You may not choose a player with fewer Palette cards than you.
3: Draw a card from the Draw Deck (automatically) .
5: Play another card from your hand to your Palette. You can still discard to the Canvas after doing so.
7: Choose a card from your Palette and either discard it to the Canvas or place it face down on top of the Draw Deck. If you discard it, you must be winning afterward.



*notes:
1. If you are playing with action rule 1 and there is no option for stealing another player's card (because your palette is longer than everyone else's), it might still show the message for this rule in red on top of the page. If so, just click a random card from another player and it will be ignored (the card will work as a non-action rule card)
2. After playing the action rule 5 it might appear the button for choosing another card to play on the palette. Please ignore that option, it shouldn't be possible Thanks!!! (these small bugs couldn't be fixed on time ):
